Key.Original: You have escaped from prison. Run forest, run!
Key.English: You have escaped from prison. Run forest, run!
Key.Polish: Uciekłeś z więzienia. Zmykaj stąd póki możesz!

Key.Original: You have served all of your sentences. Don't forget to pick your stuff from locker!
Key.English: You have served all of your sentences. Don't forget to pick your stuff from locker!
Key.Polish: Odsiedziałeś swoje wszystkie wyroki. Nie zapomnij zabrać rzeczy ze swojej szafki!

Key.Original: This sentence is to high for this facility. Maximum sentence is: %1
Key.English: This sentence is to high for this facility. Maximum sentence is: %1
Key.Polish: Ten wyrok jest za długi dla tej placówki. Maksimum wyrok wynosi: %1

Key.Original: This sentence is to low for this facility. Minimum sentence is: %1
Key.English: This sentence is to low for this facility. Minimum sentence is: %1
Key.Polish: Ten wyrok jest za krótki dla tej placówki. Minimalny wyrok wynosi: %1

Key.Original: This facility does not serve for this kind of prisoners!
Key.English: This facility does not serve for this kind of prisoners!
Key.Polish: Ta placówka nie obsługuje tego typu więźniów
